original: intros u l H. unfold Sup_seq. destruct (ex_sup_seq u) as [l' Hl']. apply is_sup_seq_lub in H. apply is_sup_opp_inf_seq in H. rewrite Rbar_opp_involutive in H. apply is_inf_opp_sup_seq in H. apply is_inf_seq_ext with (fun n => Rbar_opp (u n)) (Rbar_opp l) in H. apply Rbar_is_glb_inf_seq in H. apply is_inf_opp_sup_seq in H. rewrite Rbar_opp_involutive in H. apply is_sup_opp_inf_seq in H. rewrite Rbar_opp_involutive in H. apply is_sup_opp_inf_seq in H. apply is_sup_seq_ext with u l' in H. apply Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq in H. apply Rbar_is_lub_unique in H. apply H.
